nodes.text: The Calamasthon Defiance was a group with whom the Draag criminal Slaag Lado had ties. In 32 BBY, Lado was wanted by the Mon Calamari Civil Authority for allegedly creating a huge seismic attack that led to immense environmental damage in the Salinrerian Sea and resulted in constant rain on the site. In the bounty posted for Lado, the Civil Authority noted the Draag's ties to the Calamasthon Defiance.

The Calamasthon Defiance was first mentioned in the 2002 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Bounty Hunter. The organization is mentioned in the bounty information for Slaag Lado, who appears in the game's second chapter, "Lowlifes In High Places."
